title: How do I send a file using Bluetooth?
answer:
To share an audio clip, a photo, or a video, touch and hold the file in Music > Recently added > Share > Bluetooth or Gallery > Share > Bluetooth to send the file. 

 To share a website, open a website, and touch Menu > Share page > Bluetooth. 

 [To share a contact, go to Contacts, and touch Menu > Share Contacts > Bluetooth.]()
